item.title: 罗斯百货（Ross Stores）上调利润预期，第二季度业绩超预期，原因是需求稳定
item.description: 罗斯百货公司（Ross Stores）周四上调了 2024 财年的利润预期，并公布了高于华尔街预期的第二季度业绩，这主要得益于对折扣服装的需求以及运费成本的降低。【原文：Ross Stores on Thursday raised its fiscal 2024 profit forecast and posted second-quarter results above Wall Street estimates, benefiting from demand for its discounted apparel and easing freight costs.】

item.title: 通用汽车 Cruise 将在 Uber 平台上部署自动驾驶汽车
item.description: 优步（Uber）和通用汽车支持的 Cruise 公司周四表示，Cruise 将在优步的打车公司平台上部署其自动驾驶汽车，这是一项多年协议的一部分。【原文：Uber and General Motors-backed Cruise said on Thursday Cruise will deploy its autonomous vehicles on the ride-hailing company's platform as part of a multi-year deal.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，阿斯利康警告称将把英国疫苗生产转移到美国
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，阿斯利康公司警告称，由于与工党政府就削减该项目国家援助计划的谈判陷入僵局，该公司可能会将其疫苗生产基地从英国迁往美国。【原文：AstraZeneca has warned it could relocate its vaccine manufacturing site from the UK to the U.S. amid a deadlock in negotiations with the Labour government over plans to cut state aid promised to the project, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国邮政寻求通过投递和其他变革在 10 年内节省 300 亿美元
item.description: 美国邮政服务公司（U.S. Postal Service）周四表示，该公司正致力于实施改革，预计在未来十年内将为该机构节省约 300 亿美元。【原文：The U.S. Postal Service said on Thursday it is aiming to implement changes that it estimates will save the agency roughly $30 billion over the next decade.】

item.title: 聚焦：福特的三排电动 "个人子弹头列车 "SUV为何会失控？
item.description: 去年，在密歇根州迪尔伯恩举行的投资者日上，福特汽车公司的高管们盛赞他们即将推出的三排电动 SUV，并称这款车将于 2025 年下线。【原文：At a packed investor day in Dearborn, Michigan, last year, Ford Motor executives lauded their forthcoming three-row electric SUV, which they said would be rolling off assembly lines in 2025.】

item.title: 百时美施贵宝支持的 Zenas 生物制药公司申请在美国上市
item.description: 周四提交的一份监管文件显示，百时美施贵宝支持的Zenas BioPharma公司已申请在美国上市，这表明投资者对新上市企业的胃口越来越大。【原文：Bristol-Myers Squibb-backed Zenas BioPharma has filed to go public in the United States, a regulatory filing showed on Thursday, underscoring improving investor appetite for new listings.】

item.title: ELFA 称，7 月份美国商业设备借款增长 13
item.description: 美国设备租赁与融资协会周四称，7 月份美国公司设备投资融资借款同比增长了 13%。【原文：U.S. companies increased borrowing to finance equipment investments by 13% in July compared with the previous year, the Equipment Leasing and Finance Association said on Thursday.】

item.title: Perplexity AI 将于第四季度在搜索平台上推出广告
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）和杰夫-贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）支持的Perplexity AI公司周四表示，计划在第四季度在其人工智能驱动的搜索平台上推出广告。【原文：Nvidia and Jeff Bezos-backed Perplexity AI said on Thursday that it plans to introduce advertising on its artificial intelligence-powered search platform by the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 智利科德尔科公司因尾矿坝违规可能面临 800 万美元罚款
item.description: 智利环境监管机构周四表示，已就智利北部 Ministro Hales 分部塔拉布雷尾矿坝的管理问题对国有铜业巨头 Codelco 公司提出两项指控。【原文：Chile's environmental regulator on Thursday said it filed two charges against state copper giant Codelco over the management of its Talabre tailings dam at its Ministro Hales division in northern Chile.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Evolent Health 在收到收购意向后正在进行出售谈判
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周四表示，Evolent Health 正在与私募股权公司和医疗保健服务提供商洽谈潜在的出售事宜，这一过程是在该公司收到收购意向后启动的。【原文：Evolent Health is in talks with private equity firms and healthcare services providers for a potential sale, in a process that kicked off after it received takeover interest, people familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 柯林斯：美联储有 "清晰的路径 "在不衰退的情况下实现目标
item.description: 波士顿联储主席苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）周四表示，相信美国央行能够在不引发经济衰退的情况下降低通胀，并表示支持下月开始降息。【原文：Boston Federal Reserve President Susan Collins on Thursday expressed confidence the U.S. central bank will be able to bring inflation down without triggering a recession, and signaled her support for starting interest rate cuts next month.】

item.title: 上诉法院裁定亚马逊必须面对华盛顿特区的反垄断诉讼
item.description: 华盛顿特区的一家上诉法院周四恢复了该地区对亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc）的诉讼，称其合理地声称这家在线零售商的定价政策非法扼杀了竞争。【原文：An appeals court in Washington, D.C. revived the district's lawsuit against Amazon.com Inc on Thursday, saying it plausibly claimed the online retailer's pricing policies illegally stifle competition.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：CME 和标准普尔探讨出售合资企业 OSTTRA
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，衍生品交易所 CME 集团和金融信息公司 S&P Global 正在权衡出售合资企业 OSTTRA 的事宜。【原文：Derivatives exchange CME Group and financial information company S&P Global are weighing a sale of joint venture OSTTRA, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 力拓制定应急计划，最大限度减少加拿大铁路停运造成的影响
item.description: 力拓矿业公司（Rio Tinto）周四告诉路透社记者，该公司预计工人与加拿大两大铁路网络管理层之间的劳资纠纷将影响其在加拿大多个地点接收原材料并向北美客户运输产品的能力。【原文：Rio Tinto expects the labor dispute between the workers and the management of Canada's two biggest rail networks will affect its ability to receive raw materials at several sites across Canada and ship products to customers in North America, the miner told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国劳工统计局因最新数据失误再次受到审查
item.description: 美国劳工统计局本应于周三公开发布的就业市场数据莫名其妙地被推迟，但在该局发布数据之前，这些数据仍然出现在了社交媒体平台上，美国劳工统计局因此再次受到审查。【原文：The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics is once again under scrutiny after closely watched job market data due for public release on Wednesday was inexplicably delayed but still found its way onto social media platforms before the agency posted it.】

item.title: 加拿大航空公司飞行员投票批准罢工
item.description: 加拿大航空公司飞行员工会周四表示，加航飞行员投票赞成授权罢工。【原文：Air Canada pilots voted in favor of authorizing a strike, the Air Line Pilots Association union said on Thursday.】

item.title: 雀巢公司由资深员工弗莱克斯接替首席执行官施奈德的职位
item.description: 雀巢公司周四表示，将由服务多年的高管洛朗-弗莱克西（Laurent Freixe）接替首席执行官马克-施耐德（Mark Schneider），这是全球最大食品制造商的一次重大变动。【原文：Nestle is replacing Chief Executive Mark Schneider with long-serving executive Laurent Freixe, the company said on Thursday, a big change at the world's biggest foodmaker which has struggled with the cost of living crisis hitting customers.】

item.title: 苹果将更新欧盟浏览器选项，使更多应用程序可删除
item.description: 苹果公司周四表示，将改变欧盟地区用户选择浏览器选项的方式，增加一个专门用于更改默认应用程序的部分，并使更多应用程序可删除。【原文：Apple will change how users choose browser options in the European Union, add a dedicated section for changing default apps, and make more apps deletable, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期固定利率抵押贷款降至 2023 年 5 月以来最低水平
item.description: 本周，美国流行的 30 年期固定利率抵押贷款平均利率降至 2023 年 5 月以来的最低水平，但可能还需要进一步下降，住房市场的需求才会出现明显改善。【原文：The average rate on the popular U.S. 30-year fixed-rate mortgage ticked down this week to the lowest level since May 2023, but may need to fall further for the housing market to see significant improvement in demand.】

item.title: 报告称，宝马在欧洲电动汽车销量首次超过特斯拉
item.description: 市场研究公司 JATO Dynamics 的数据显示，宝马首次击败美国汽车制造商特斯拉，领跑欧洲电池电动汽车（BEV）市场。【原文：BMW led the European battery electric vehicle (BEV) market for the first time, beating U.S. automaker Tesla , according to market research firm JATO Dynamics.】

item.title: 加拿大铁路网络关闭，马士基关注应急计划，仍接受预订
item.description: 在加拿大两大货运铁路公司因劳资纠纷而关闭网络之后，马士基航运公司周四表示，该公司正在评估在加拿大的应急战略。【原文：Shipping company Maersk is evaluating contingency strategies in Canada, the company said on Thursday after the country's two main freight rail companies shut down their networks over a labour dispute.】

item.title: 香奈儿收购瑞士小众制表商 MB&F 25% 的股份
item.description: 法国奢侈品牌香奈儿周四表示，香奈儿收购了瑞士高端制表商 MB&F 公司 25% 的股份，该公司以奇特的手表设计而闻名，香奈儿补充说，这是香奈儿扩大制表业务战略的一部分。【原文：Chanel has bought a 25% stake in high-end Swiss watchmaker MB&F, known for its quirky watch designs, the French luxury house said on Thursday, adding it was part of strategy to increase its presence in watch-making.】

item.title: 迈克-林奇（Mike Lynch）是英国科技界的开拓者，他在美国被无罪释放后死于海上
item.description: 迈克-林奇（Mike Lynch），这位在豪华游艇沉没于西西里岛附近海域时丧生的科技大亨，用了十多年的时间创建了英国最大的软件公司，又用了几乎同样长的时间来对抗关于他夸大公司价值以确保数十亿英镑出售的指控。【原文：Mike Lynch, the tech tycoon who died when his luxury yacht sank off Sicily, spent more than a decade building Britain's biggest software company and almost as long again fighting charges he had inflated its value to secure a multi-billion-pound sale.】

item.title: 美联储决策者认为就业市场是决定降息的关键
item.description: 美联储决策者周四表示，随着通胀率从高位大幅回落，他们正在密切关注美国劳动力市场，以判断何时开始降息，其中一位决策者表示应该 "很快 "行动。【原文：Federal Reserve policymakers on Thursday said that with inflation well down from its highs they are paying close attention to the U.S. labor market to gauge when to begin reducing interest rates, with one saying they should move "soon."】

item.title: 美国 7 月成屋销售增幅高于预期
item.description: 美国 7 月份成屋销售增幅超过预期，扭转了连续四个月下降的趋势，因为供应量的增加和抵押贷款利率的下降为未来几个月的活动反弹带来了希望。【原文：U.S. existing home sales rose more than expected in July, reversing four consecutive monthly declines, as improving supply and declining mortgage rates offered hope that activity could rebound in the months ahead.】

item.title: 申银万国加强供应商审计，披露童工案件
item.description: 快速时尚零售商希恩（Shein）在其 2023 年可持续发展报告中称，去年在其供应商中发现了两起童工案例，该公司在计划上市前加强了对中国制造商的审计，以平息对其低成本商业模式的批评。【原文：Fast fashion retailer Shein found two cases of child labour at its suppliers last year, it said in its 2023 sustainability report, as it stepped up audits of manufacturers in China to assuage criticisms of its low-cost business model ahead of a planned flotation.】

item.title: 美国商业活动走低，定价能力进一步减弱
item.description: 美国 8 月份的商业活动降至 4 个月来的最低点，企业继续努力将更高的价格转嫁给消费者，这使得通胀在未来几个月内保持下降趋势的可能性增大。【原文：U.S. business activity fell to a 4-month low in August and firms continued to struggle to pass on higher prices to consumers, bolstering the likelihood that inflation will stay on a downward trend over the coming months.】

item.title: 美联储主席哈克准备有条不紊地启动降息进程
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长帕特里克-哈克（Patrick Harker）周四表示，只要数据表现符合他的预期，他就同意 9 月份降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker said Thursday he was on board with a September rate cut as long as the data performs as he expects it to.】

item.title: 上海交割规则变化导致卖方卖空
item.description: 四位熟知内情的消息人士称，上海期货交易所（ShFE）的电池金属铅潜在卖家被迫寻找海外供应，或在规格发生变化后将他们希望平仓的远期合约展期。【原文：Would-be sellers of battery metal lead on the Shanghai Futures Exchange (ShFE) have been forced to search for overseas supplies or roll forward contracts they hoped to close following a change in specifications, four sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯：很快将适宜降息
item.description: 波士顿联储主席苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）周四表示，美联储很快将适宜开始降息周期，这表明她可能支持美国央行在下个月的政策会议上降息。【原文：It will soon be appropriate for the Federal Reserve to begin a rate-cutting cycle, Boston Fed President Susan Collins said on Thursday, signaling her likely support for a rate cut at the U.S. central bank's policy meeting next month.】
